EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Armored Augmentation I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain the Magical Training feat.
Each Core ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to all Spell DCs +5 Melee power +4 Ranged Power +15 Hit Points +25 Spell Points +5 Electric, Sonic, Rust, Repair, and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Armored Augmentation II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +15% Fortification and +3 to each Healing Amplification. Your Rune Arms now benefit from the Maximize, Empower, and Intensify Spell Metamagics if you own those feats. This does not cost Spell Points, and you do not need the Feats toggled on to gain their effects on Rune Arms.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Armored Augmentation III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +15% Fortification and +3 to each Healing Amplification. Your Ablative Armor spell now blocks 20 points of damage per caster level with no cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Armored Augmentation IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +15% Fortification and +3 to each Healing Amplification. +15% Exceptional Bonus to Armor Class. Your caster level with Rune Arm shots now factors bonuses from your Epic and Legendary Knowledge feats.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Sprockets
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Repair Amplification. Rank 3: If you have the Construct Exemplar feat, you gain +10 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Solid Footing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Tinker Tailoring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spellcraft and Use Magic Device. Your Rune Arms charge [5/10/15]% faster.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Epic Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Epic Strike!

EnhancementSelection.Name: Galvanic Blast
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Galvanic Blast Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Heighten, Embolden, Intensify Spell Resistance: No Spell Point Cost: 20 Cooldown: 15 seconds. Epic Strike: A storm of fearsome Electricity explodes from within you, dealing 1d6+6 Electric damage per caster level to all enemies nearby.
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mending Burst
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Mending Burst Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, heighten, Embolden, Intensify Spell Resistance: No Spell Point Cost: 20 Cooldown: 15 seconds. Epic Strike: A field of magical energy explodes from within you, repairing all allies nearby for 3d6+6 Repair healing +1 per caster level.
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sonic Boom
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Sonic Boom Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, heighten, Embolden, Intensify Spell Resistance: No Spell Point Cost: 20 Cooldown: 15 seconds. Epic Strike: A wave of concussive sound explodes from within you, dealing 1d6+6 Sonic damage per caster level to all enemies nearby.
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Blast Shields
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Reflex Saving throws. Rank 3: You no longer automatically fail Reflex saving throws on a natural 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Fluidity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Armor and/or Body type no longer contributes to Arcane Spell Failure.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Radiant Prison
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target non-boss foe is sealed away for 8 seconds in an Unbreakable Forcefield with no save. In this Forcefield, they cannot act, but take 95% less damage and healing from all sources (except untyped).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Rune Arm Use
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Rune Arm Use feat. Your Caster Level with Rune Arms is now based on the higher of half your Character Level versus your Artificer Level. If you already have the Rune Arm Use feat, +1 Stable Charge Tier.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Hammer Time!
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Hammer Spell!

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tonquin's Lightning Hammer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Lightning Hammer Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Heighten, Embolden, Intensify Spell Resistance: No Spell Point Cost: 12 Cooldown: 10 seconds. Form a hammer of pure lightning to strike foes in an area, dealing 1d6+6 Electric damage per caster level.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tonquin's Thunder Hammer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Thunder Hammer Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Heighten, Embolden, Intensify Spell Resistance: No Spell Point Cost: 12 Cooldown: 10 seconds. Form a hammer of pure thunder to strike foes in an area, dealing 1d6+6 Sonic damage per caster level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Forcefield Generator
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Machrotechnic Destiny Mantle: You create a small animated object that floats with you. While active, you gain +15 Repair Amplification, and you absorb 10% of all Force, Piercing, Bludgeoning, Slashing, Electric, Sonic, and Rust damage you take. This is increased to 15% if you are wearing a Rune Arm.

Stance.Name: Machrotechnic Destiny Mantle
Stance.Description: Machrotechnic Destiny Mantle: You create a small animated object that floats with you. While active, you gain +15 Repair Amplification, and you absorb 10% of all Force, Piercing, Bludgeoning, Slashing, Electric, Sonic, and Rust damage you take. This is increased to 15% if you are wearing a Rune Arm.

Effect.DisplayName: Machrotechnic: Forcefield Generator I + Rune Arm

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Spell School to enhance!

EnhancementSelection.Name: Abjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Abjuration Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Conjuration Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Evocation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Evocation Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Transmutation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Transmutation Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Technique Drive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Install a Drive to enhance your combat techniques.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficiency Drive
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[3/6/9]% Spell Cost Reduction.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flash Drive
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[150/300/450]% more threat with all damage types.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Speed Drive
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[2/4/6]% Doublestrike and Doubleshot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Storm Core
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Rune Arm DCs. Rank 3: +5 Sonic, Electric, Repair, Rust, and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Arcane Imbuement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] bonus Imbue dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Improved Aegis
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While using your Machrotechnic Destiny Mantle, you gain +5 Physical and Magical Resistance Rating. If you are wearing a Rune Arm, gain +10 instead.

Effect.DisplayName: Machrotechnic: Forcefield Generator II + Rune Arm

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Galvanic Attunement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Sonic, Electric, Repair, Rust, and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Strike Drive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Install a Drive to enhance your Epic Strike.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Blast Drive
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your Machrotechnic Epic Strike now Stuns enemies struck for 3 seconds, assuming they fail a Fortitude save. If you are using the Electric Epic Strike, this also Supercharges you. (DC 20 + Highest of INT/WIS/CHA mod + Evocation DCs + bonus Rune Arm DCs)
Supercharge: +30% Action boost bonus to Movement speed. Duration: 5 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dissonance Drive
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Machrotechnic Epic Strike now confuses enemies struck for 6 seconds, assuming they fail a Fortitude save. If you are using the Sonic Epic Strike, they also take 3 stacks of Vulnerability and 3 stacks of Armor Destruction. (DC 20 + Highest of INT/WIS/CHA mod + Evocation DCs + bonus Rune Arm DCs)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ruin Drive
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your Machrotechnic Epic Strike now disassembles enemy constructs, dealing 1d6+6 bonus Rust damage per caster level. If you are using the Repair Epic Strike, this also Supercharges you.
Supercharge: -1 to each of your Metamagic costs. Duration: 5 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Boost Drive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Install a Drive to enhance your Rune Arm blasts.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Echo Drive
EnhancementSelection.Description: Once per second, an enemy hit by your Rune Arm spells take an additional 1d4 bonus Sonic damage per caster level, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spark Drive
EnhancementSelection.Description: Once per second, an enemy hit by your Rune Arm spells take an additional 1d4 bonus Electric damage per caster level, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Epic Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Metamagic to focus on.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Epic Improved Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you [2/4/6] fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Epic Improved Intensify
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Intensify Spell Metamagic costs you [2/4/6] fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Epic Improved Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you [3/6/9] fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Magical Recoil
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5 Electric, Sonic, Rust, Repair, and Universal Spell Power. While using your Machrotechnic Destiny Mantle, firing a Rune Arm grants you spell resistance equal to your character level for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Spell DCs
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Critical Connection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Critical Multiplier on a roll of 19-20 with weapons while wearing a Rune Arm.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Armor of Legends
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
The Epic Mage Armor feat's bonus is now untyped and grants you +1 AC per character level. Furthermore, based on your installed Drives, you gain the following bonuses:
Speed Drive: +5% Action boost bonus to Attack Speed. Efficiency Drive: +5% Action boost bonus to Movement Speed. Flash Drive: +10 Action boost bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating. Ruin Drive: +10 Action boost bonus to Spell Power. Blast Drive: +3 Action boost bonus to Saves. Dissonance Drive: +3 Action boost bonus to Tactics DCs. Spark Drive: +10 Action boost bonus to Energy Resistance. Echo Drive: +1 Action boost bonus to Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Maximum Overdrive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Epic Moment: Shift into MAXIMUM OVERDRIVE. This grants you a 100% boost to Rune Arm Charge Speed and Cooldown Speed, a 50% reduction in Spell Cooldowns, a 30% Action Boost bonus to Attack Speed, and a 50% Action Boost bonus to movement speed for 30 seconds. Cooldown: 5 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Machrotechnic: Forcefield Generator
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While using your Machrotechnic Destiny Mantle, you gain a +10% Insight bonus to Maximum Hit Points. While you have a Rune Arm equipped, increase this bonus to 20%.
